title: Happy Birthday, Emma-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Happy Birthday, Emma-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Thank you, Ayumu-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay, let’s take you to the party then! Each of us brought some bread today that we wanted you to try, Emma-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Bread!? I love bread! I’m so happy. What did you bring, Ayumu-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>That’s for you to see yourself.... Or so I would like to say, but I can’t wait, so I’ll just tell you. I deep-fried bread crusts and covered them with various sugars~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Eeeeh!? You turned bread crusts into sweets!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah♪ I used granulated sugar, cinnamon sugar, Wasanbon sugar, brown sugar, and cane sugar. I also made a few with cream cheese and honey as a bonus.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>J-, just hearing that makes me hungry~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufufu, let’s hurry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Yeah! I’m going to eat lots~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
